dest_image_alt: DataRobot's user interface showing a bar and line graph and asking questions such as "What would you like to predict" and "What is the primary date/time feature". In the center of the interface is a large "Start" button.
dest_ingest_image_alt: DataRobot's "Import from URL" form showing the URL https://reform.example.com/api/tables/3a4f239c-984f-43f5-ab84-86cead94f0c8/live/dataset
dest_ingest_instructions: Then simply paste the table's access link into DataRobot. REFORM magically transforms the latest data into a mathematically correct analytic ready table and feeds this into your models for training and prediction.
dest_supported_sql: AWS Redshift, Snowflake, AWS Athena and MS SQL Server
